fee_structure.establish_comprehension_and_have_an_in-d: Apply the knowledge in analyzing and bringing creative solutions to complex international issues through cooperation, conflict resolution, diplomacy and creative thinking.
Demonstrate critical, analytical, research, problem-solving, self-learning and communication skills required for a range of careers in public and private sectors and also for self-employment.
Demonstrate entrepreneurship, innovativeness, and continuous learning.
